channel.title: Runescape Based Android Game
channel.description:
So this is just a project I have been working on recently trying to recreate a runescape themed game for android havent found anything on the playstore that suites my needs so figured why not make my own. I know its very basic but its just a work in progress doing lots of testing atm to make sure I can proceed with everything I want to make this into.
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/62d5d4bcd464484b289c2ac32dc6a5d0.gif[/img]
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/188bfc9494d1b138df4f7847b4463813.gif[/img]
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/a6c162b393d5fca96bf70031f3be2da7.gif[/img]
I made the character model myself :D tried making it resemble rs2 I think I achieved that.

item.title: Runescape Based Android Game
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

You have a good point but you know what they say, aim for the moon and if you miss you’ll be among the stars. I think trying to dictate what people should and shouldn’t do with their time is a waste of time when you could be productive.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Based Android Game
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“sini, post:26, topic:553780”]I think he meant more or less those were conflicting descriptions. Z also probably meant that it takes more than just one person to develop the systems for a game like that. It takes a team of brilliant people, however of course one person gets most of the credit. Or people don’t even want credit, because it’s what they love to do.

I think it’s mean to try and put down people who are at least trying to use these projects as a tool to learn. There’s been quite a bit of hostility, towards the projects. I think both Limits and hadlich are capable of pushing forward their own ideas of how they want the game to work. On the scale of Runescape? Hell no. You need a team of engineers for that.[/quote]
And that’s my issue with these projects, not that they can’t learn anything out of it, but the idea that there will come any game out of this that you would spend time playing. They’re picking the wrong scope for the amount of developers on the project.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Based Android Game
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

I think he meant more or less those were conflicting descriptions. Z also probably meant that it takes more than just one person to develop the systems for a game like that. It takes a team of brilliant people, however of course one person gets most of the credit. Or people don’t even want credit, because it’s what they love to do.

I think it’s mean to try and put down people who are at least trying to use these projects as a tool to learn. There’s been quite a bit of hostility, towards the projects. I think both Limits and hadlich are capable of pushing forward their own ideas of how they want the game to work. On the scale of Runescape? Hell no. You need a team of engineers for that.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Based Android Game
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“z, post:20, topic:553780”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=672702.msg4499849#msg4499849 date=1449063751]

[quote author=z link=topic=672702.msg4499827#msg4499827 date=1449011004]

[quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=672702.msg4498570#msg4498570 date=1447073195]

Don’t you mean RS based Android tech demo? Because it is in no way a game yet, and it will never be.

Thanks for the inspiration, take your kind words and shove them up your ass

I prefer fingers over word, but thanks for the suggestion.

If you want to make a RS-clone, you don’t know the work required.

I’m pretty sure I can make something similar with my current knowledge even if it’s nothing big it’s just something I want to do. Not sure exactly why you hating on me so much, but hey if it makes you feel better about your lonely self go ahead buddy;)

It’s not about the knowledge, but the volume.
[/quote]Yep, Bowser jr is right. It took several employees at Jagex to build RuneScape 2. You need someone who is good with graphics, sound, programming, … and not a single employee (not even Andrew, I believe) comes close to being good with all of these.
[/quote] but asset devs are a dime a dozen engine devs like andrew are pretty rare. If you can build the engine getting the content for it is pretty easy.
[/quote]being a “dime a dozen” dev AND a “pretty rare” dev is impossible[/quote]
asset devs are a dime a dozen
engine devs like andrew are pretty rare

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Based Android Game
item.dc:creator: @justaguy justaguy
item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

[quote=“sini, post:21, topic:553780”][quote author=Limits link=topic=672702.msg4499866#msg4499866 date=1449069426]

[quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=672702.msg4499849#msg4499849 date=1449063751]

Don’t you mean RS based Android tech demo? Because it is in no way a game yet, and it will never be.

Thanks for the inspiration, take your kind words and shove them up your ass

I prefer fingers over word, but thanks for the suggestion.

If you want to make a RS-clone, you don’t know the work required.

I’m pretty sure I can make something similar with my current knowledge even if it’s nothing big it’s just something I want to do. Not sure exactly why you hating on me so much, but hey if it makes you feel better about your lonely self go ahead buddy;)

It’s not about the knowledge, but the volume.
[/quote]Yep, Bowser jr is right. It took several employees at Jagex to build RuneScape 2. You need someone who is good with graphics, sound, programming, … and not a single employee (not even Andrew, I believe) comes close to being good with all of these.
[/quote] but asset devs are a dime a dozen engine devs like andrew are pretty rare. If you can build the engine getting the content for it is pretty easy.

Wink wink hint hint

To add, not using OpenGL/Dx is suicidal unless you went to school for a degree in the mathematics involved.[/quote]

shudders

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Based Android Game
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“Limits, post:19, topic:553780”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=672702.msg4499849#msg4499849 date=1449063751]

[quote author=z link=topic=672702.msg4499827#msg4499827 date=1449011004]

Don’t you mean RS based Android tech demo? Because it is in no way a game yet, and it will never be.

Thanks for the inspiration, take your kind words and shove them up your ass

I prefer fingers over word, but thanks for the suggestion.

If you want to make a RS-clone, you don’t know the work required.

I’m pretty sure I can make something similar with my current knowledge even if it’s nothing big it’s just something I want to do. Not sure exactly why you hating on me so much, but hey if it makes you feel better about your lonely self go ahead buddy;)

It’s not about the knowledge, but the volume.
[/quote]Yep, Bowser jr is right. It took several employees at Jagex to build RuneScape 2. You need someone who is good with graphics, sound, programming, … and not a single employee (not even Andrew, I believe) comes close to being good with all of these.
[/quote] but asset devs are a dime a dozen engine devs like andrew are pretty rare. If you can build the engine getting the content for it is pretty easy.

Wink wink hint hint[/quote]

The difference between you and him is we live in an age where there are free engines that pale in comparison to anything you’ve ever created. This isn’t 1999.

To add, not using OpenGL/Dx is suicidal unless you went to school for a degree in the mathematics involved. Exceptions for this are certain nuances you NEED that both don’t provide. You haven’t yet, or are not. So get off your high horse and shut up.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Based Android Game
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:13, topic:553780”][quote author=hadlich4 link=topic=672702.msg4498740#msg4498740 date=1447330381]

Game dev requires a lot of work. For a game as large as you mention, you’re going to fall short from the manpower alone. I hate to be negative but that’s reality.

Just takes patience and small breaks, with a mindset like that I wouldn’t finish this but I’m determined just gotta go slow and make goals and only focus on those goals because that’s the quickest way to get things done if I’m all over the place working on different things then I’ll just be slowing myself down. It’s going to be a long process but I’ll get it eventually.
[/quote]

Well you know I’ve always provided support for your learning privately, so I’ll do the same here. Good luck, I hope you enjoy the process and learn a lot from it.
That’s what is important at the end of the day :).[/quote]

Thanks man I appreciate it was having inventory switching issues but found the issue now just have to get inventory to bank item switching figured out then I’ll be on a roll with things

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Based Android Game
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“hadlich4, post:12, topic:553780”][quote author=Tree link=topic=672702.msg4498734#msg4498734 date=1447327539]
Game dev requires a lot of work. For a game as large as you mention, you’re going to fall short from the manpower alone. I hate to be negative but that’s reality.
[/quote]

Just takes patience and small breaks, with a mindset like that I wouldn’t finish this but I’m determined just gotta go slow and make goals and only focus on those goals because that’s the quickest way to get things done if I’m all over the place working on different things then I’ll just be slowing myself down. It’s going to be a long process but I’ll get it eventually.[/quote]

Well you know I’ve always provided support for your learning privately, so I’ll do the same here. Good luck, I hope you enjoy the process and learn a lot from it.
That’s what is important at the end of the day :).

Read full topic
